M-1.title: Ballerina
M-1.description: A gripping tale of redemption and revenge in a neon-lit, futuristic Seoul. When a former bodyguard is hired to protect a pop star, she uncovers a vast conspiracy that stretches back to her own past.

M-2.title: Fantastic 4
M-2.description: Four individuals gain remarkable powers after a cosmic ray exposure and must learn to use them to defend the world from a powerful, yet familiar, threat.

M-3.title: Wicked
M-3.description: The incredible untold story of the witches of Oz. Before Dorothy arrived, one with green skin and a fiery temper finds her true calling.

M-4.title: The Fall Guy
M-4.description: A former stuntman springs back into action when the star of a new movie goes missing, attempting to win back the love of his life in the process.

M-5.title: Cake
M-5.description: A dark comedy about a baker who discovers her secret ingredient is the key to unimaginable wealth and unexpected danger.

M-6.title: Warrior
M-6.description: A historical drama following a young samurai who must choose between his family duty and the changing world of Meiji Japan.

M-7.title: Suit
M-7.description: A financial thriller where a tailor discovers coded secrets woven into the fabric of a CEO's custom suit.

M-8.title: STARFALL
M-8.description: The final season of the epic space opera. The crew of the Phoenix makes one last desperate jump to save humanity.

M-9.title: OMEGA 7
M-9.description: A team of genetically engineered soldiers must hunt down the rogue seventh member before he unleashes a weapon of mass destruction.

M-10.title: NIGHT OPS
M-10.description: An elite special forces team attempts a daring midnight rescue behind enemy lines, facing impossible odds and a digital enemy.

M-11.title: THE GAME
M-11.description: In a world where life and death are decided by a high-stakes board game, a new player enters the arena seeking to challenge the master.

M-12.title: REBIRTH
M-12.description: A thrilling sci-fi series about a corporation that promises eternal life through digital consciousness transfer, with a sinister catch.

M-13.title: WITCH TOWN
M-13.description: A cozy mystery series set in a small town where magic is real but treated as a common nuisance by the local detective.
